text: Can you help me reset my password for my account?
Sure, what is your username and email associated with the account?
My username is user1 and my email is user1@example.com
Okay, I have initiated the password reset process. Please check your email for the verification code. Once you receive it, please let me know.
Okay, I received the verification code. Now, what should I do?
Great! Please give me the verification code and the new password you want to set.
The verification code is 970420 and the new password is user1newpass
Your password has been reset successfully. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Can you help me delete my account?
Sure, I just need to get the token for authentication. What is your username and password?
My username is user1 and my password is user1pass
I have obtained the token. Please verify that you want to delete your account.
Yes, I want to delete my account.
Your account has been successfully deleted. Let me know if I can be of further assistance.
